Freddie Mercury

Is this the real life, Is this just fantasy

Who was Frederick "Freddie" Mercury?

  • Born: 5 September 1946, Stone Town, Tanzania
  • Died: 24 November 1991, Kensington, London, United Kingdom
  • Music groups: Queen (1970 – 1991), The Hectics (1958 – 1962), Sour Milk Sea (1969 – 1970)
  • Education: Ealing Art College (1966–1969)
  • Awards: Brit Award for Outstanding Contribution to Music, NME Award for Bastard of the Year
